data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mayvan, Mahmood Mehrafroz, Shayanmehr, Masoumeh, Smolis, Adrian, Skarżyński, Dariusz (2015): Persanura hyrcanica, a new genus and species of Neanurinae (Collembola: Neanuridae) from Iran, with a key to genera of the tribe Neanurini. Zootaxa 3918 (4): 552-558, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3918.4.4
